column5: Heading up to Grassy Narrows in early July. Normally we bring our own boats but ended up 1 short. The resort we go to only rents small boats so we are looking to rent a 16' or larger boat. Does anyone know of a place that would rent such a boat?
Do you know if they will rent to you if your not staying at their resort.

I have rented boats from Buena Vista when I used to camp in Obabikon. Just act like you will treat them like your own, which you should, and they'll rent them. Give em a call and ask - 1-800-488-5652. Good luck,
Do you know what kind of boats they run.
I can't think of the name. The ones we had were 16 ft. shiny aluminum, made in Canada, I think. They may also have 18 ft, donno.
